// {{{ NX.Error.raise

/**
 * @class NX.Error
 */

/**
 * @method raise
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(err) {

    err = err || {};

    if(NX.isString(err)) {
        err = { msg: err };
    }

    var method = this.raise.caller;

    if(method) {

        if(method.$name) {
            err.sourceMethod = method.$name;
        }

        if(method.$owner) {
            err.sourceClass = method.$owner.$className;
        }

    }

    if(NX.Error.handle(err) !== true) {

        var msg = NX.Error.prototype.toString.call(err);

        NX.log({
            msg: msg,
            level: 'error',
            dump: err,
            stack: true
        });

        throw new NX.Error(err);
    }
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
